chapters.title: Name the following.
chapters.content:
10. Name the following.
(a)Tissue that for ms the inner lining of our mouth.
(b)Tissue that connects muscle to bone in humans.
(c) Tissue that transports food in plants.
(d)Tissue that stor es fat in our body.
(e)Connective tissue with a fluid matrix.
(f)Tissue pr esent in the brain.
